original_text: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people, he entered into Capernaum.
korean_text: 예수께서 모든 말씀을 백성에게 들려 주시기를 마치신 후에 가버나움으로 들어가시니라

sentences.original_text: Now when he had ended all his sayings
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그가 모든 말씀을 마치셨을 때

sentences.original_text: in the audience of the people,
